title: naDaaDina mATa
sahitya:
nADADina mATa nEDu tappu valadu nA taNDri shrI rAma



anupallavi



 EDADi nADuga eDabAyani vAni pODimiga gApADudunani cinna



caraNam



 talaku vaccina bAdha talapAgaku sEtu valaci nammina vAni valalOna dagaludu 

ila bhakti sAgara mIda jEtunani talabOsi palkitivE tyAgarAjArcita
